creditline: Gift of funds form Henry Roberts and Diane and David Lilly
description: Color image of black bird perched on a bare branch; bare trees in late fall with brown leaves on ground; separate printed specimen label beneath image; received matted and framed
markings: on back, on label: [Paula McCartney / Brewer\'s Blackbird, 2006 / From the series Bird Watching / Chromogenic Print, Printed 2011 / 19x19\" image on 28x23\" paper / Edition 3/7 / Paula McCartney (signature)]
signed: on back, on label: [(...) Paula McCartney] (see Marks)
title: Brewer's Blackbird, from "Bird Watching" series
